lines.text: Wait- why would the <c=#FF0000>Go Wizard</c> go to all this trouble just to use <c=#FF0000>Emergency Exit?</c>
I mean, he's got that <c=#FF0000>Portable Hole</c> spell, right? If he wanted a quick out, he could just drop through the floor!
N-nonsense. He'd- there's someone on the lower floor. He'd wake them up, and they'd notice his magic.
So, drop Slick Emmup through the floor, then! Then dispel the hole, and call the cops to pick him up!
Close up the hole before anyone notices, and then no one even checks up here.
That's... a heck of a plan, there.
That may be, but... it's entirely possible the wizard d-didn't- didn't think of it.
They had a spell for escape, so... in the heat of the- the moment, they'd- they'd act rashly.
Kid, I'm sorry, but after this many years on the force, I can't dismiss ''the perp was stupid'' as an explanation out of hand.
